meanings.definition: A person who twists or throws silk into thread.
meanings.sent1: The throwsters worked diligently to twist the silk into thread.
meanings.sent2: I visited the throwsters at the silk factory to see how they make thread.
meanings.sent3: The throwsters decided to have a race to see who could twist the silk faster.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like throwsters, swiftly turning the silk into thread.
meanings.sent5: The throwsters' skill in twisting silk amazed everyone who watched.

meanings.definition: The process of twisting or throwing silk into thread.
meanings.sent1: Watching the throwsters at work, I learned how silk is turned into thread.
meanings.sent2: The throwsters' job is crucial in the production of fine silk products.
meanings.sent3: The throwsters' dance with the silk threads was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The throwsters' hands moved with precision, transforming silk into thread.
meanings.sent5: The throwsters' expertise in twisting silk was unmatched in the industry.
